item.title: Raichur hospital prepares for potential COVID-19 surge amid zero cases
item.description:

PTI Videos visited the special ward that has been set up in RIMS hospital in Raichur on Wednesday.
Bengaluru, May 28 (PTI) Even with zero cases, districts like Raichur are getting ready, in case there is a Covid-19 flare up.

item.title: Shortage of principals and lecturers affects govt PU colleges in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: Govt pre-university colleges in Raichur district are experiencing a severe shortage of permanent principals and lecturers, leading to heavy reliance on guest faculty.At present, out of 43 govt colleges, only four have permanent principals, and there is uncertainty regarding the appointment to the remaining posts this year.
